title: Ep 57: Tangents and Ladies & Tangents
description:
Today's proceedings:  We read about a man quitting over an uncooperative coworker, a guy who likes pretending to drive a stick shift a little too much, and a listener asks if it was wrong to marry a friends ex-husband.  Christian also found some good, definitely not shitty, science questions being asked on Reddit.   
Get your Sheesh Merch here! http://etsy.com/shop/Judgiespodcast 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod 
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod 
Intro Music by: Iván https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg 
Logo/Designs by: https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support
